entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
